All Classes

Class
Description
BattleScreen
Represents the screen where the player fights enemies and players.
Enemy
Represents an Enemy that is fought by the Player.
FirstScreen
Represents the main menu screen where the user is prompted to play.
NPC
Represents an npc that can be interacted with by the Player.
Player
This class represents a Player that the user can control.
Player.Direction
This documents the different directions the Player can move.
Screen
Represents a screen that serves as a superclass to different screens of the game.
ScreenSwitcher
An interface that can switch between screens.
SecondScreen
Represents the open world game screen where the user explores and can find npcs.
Sprite
Sprite is the class that all enemies, NPCs, and players will extend from.
